title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the refined coal credit to include qualified coal waste sludge recycling.
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the definition of refined coal for purposes of the tax credit for electricity produced from certain renewable resources to include coal produced from a qualified coal waste sludge recycling process. Defines qualified coal waste sludge recycling process as a process using a facility to liquefy coal waste sludge and distribute the liquefied coal waste sludge on the coal to create a feedstock for the manufacture of coke.
